name: Out of O2
description:
After the last game, your ship got hit by an asteroid! It's leaking air and your helmet was damaged as well. Can you power the airlock door and get to safety without running out of air?

Use WASD to move your character and hold the left mouse button to look around.

Use E or click with the left mouse button to pick up and interact with objects in the game.

Sorry for the poor lighting again. After 3 long attempts at fixing the shadows/seams/lighting, I decided to leave them be and admit defeat on this one.
